snippet: The network on Monday ordered new seasons of “New Girl,” “Raising Hope” and “Glee.”
abstract: Fox renews three shows, including New Girl, Raising Hope and Glee for its upcoming television season; move comes more than a month before the network sets its schedule.

byline.original: By BRIAN STELTER; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF

lead_paragraph: The network on Monday ordered new seasons of “New Girl,” “Raising Hope” and “Glee.”
